etymology.description: Depicts a melon suspended by its vines
etymology.interpretation: The character 瓜(瓜) (guā, "melon") visually represents the shape and outline of a melon with its vines, emphasizing its organic form and growth pattern.

examples.chinese: 他喜爱吃瓜(他喜愛吃瓜)。
夏日炎炎时(夏日炎炎時)，瓜农开始采摘瓜(瓜農開始采摘瓜)。
examples.pinyin: Xiàrì yányán shí, guānóng kāishǐ cǎizhāi guā.
examples.english: On scorching summer days, melon farmers start harvesting melons.
